document_data.mainbody: Fish-spice paste''' was a type of condiment found in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: This condiment was made from [[fish]] and [[spices]]. It had a salty flavor and came in several varieties.
document_data.Availability: [[Elgath's Provisions]] in [[Archenbridge]], sold fish-spice pastes to add flavor to their traveling [[ration]]s, in addition to their hot sauces.
